solution_line_template: Thus 3 hours and 36 minutes is {hours_to_minutes}+{additional_minutes}={total_minutes} minutes.

Thus, he ran the {total_miles} miles in {total_minutes} minutes, and each mile took {total_minutes}/{total_miles}=<<{total_minutes}/{total_miles}={minutes_per_mile}>>{minutes_per_mile} minutes for Rich to run.
